verses.verse: But speak <S%G2980><s%> you the things which <S%G3739><s%> become <S%G4241><s%> sound <S%G5198><s%> doctrine: <S%G1319><s%>
That the aged <S%G4246><s%> men be sober, <S%G3524><s%> grave, <S%G4586><s%> temperate, <S%G4998><s%> sound <S%G5198><s%> in faith, <S%G4102><s%> in charity, <S%G26><s%> in patience. <S%G5281><s%>

The aged <S%G4247><s%> women <S%G4247><s%> likewise, <S%G5615><s%> that they be in behavior <S%G2688><s%> as becomes <S%G2412><s%> holiness, <S%G2412><s%> not false <S%G1228><s%> accusers, <S%G1228><s%> not given <S%G1402><s%> to much <S%G4183><s%> wine, <S%G3631><s%> teachers <S%G2567><s%> of good <S%G2567><s%> things;
That they may teach <S%G4994><s%> the young <S%G3501><s%> women to be sober, <S%G4994><s%> to love <S%G5362><s%> their husbands, <S%G5362><s%> to love <S%G5388><s%> their children, <S%G5388><s%>

To be discreet, <S%G4998><s%> chaste, <S%G53><s%> keepers <S%G3626><s%> at <S%G3626><s%> home, <S%G3626><s%> good, <S%G18><s%> obedient <S%G5293><s%> to their own <S%G2398><s%> husbands, <S%G435><s%> that the word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> be not blasphemed. <S%G987><s%>
Young <S%G3501><s%> men likewise <S%G5615><s%> exhort <S%G3870><s%> to be sober <S%G4993><s%> minded. <S%G4993><s%>

In all <S%G3956><s%> things showing <S%G3930><s%> yourself <S%G4572><s%> a pattern <S%G5179><s%> of good <S%G2570><s%> works: <S%G2041><s%> in doctrine <S%G1319><s%> showing soundness, <S%G90><s%> gravity, <S%G4587><s%> sincerity, <S%G861><s%>

Sound <S%G5199><s%> speech, <S%G3056><s%> that cannot <S%G176><s%> be condemned; <S%G176><s%> that he that is of the contrary <S%G1727><s%> part may be ashamed, <S%G1788><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3367><s%> evil <S%G5337><s%> thing to say <S%G3004><s%> of you.

Exhort servants <S%G1401><s%> to be obedient <S%G5293><s%> to their own <S%G2398><s%> masters, <S%G1203><s%> and to please <S%G2001><s%> <S%G1511><s%> them well <S%G1510><s%> <S%G2101><s%> in all <S%G3956><s%> things; not answering <S%G483><s%> again; <S%G483><s%>

Not purloining, <S%G3557><s%> but showing <S%G1731><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> good <S%G18><s%> fidelity; <S%G4102><s%> that they may adorn <S%G2885><s%> the doctrine <S%G1319><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> our Savior <S%G4990><s%> in all <S%G3956><s%> things.
For the grace <S%G5485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> that brings salvation <S%G4992><s%> has appeared <S%G2014><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> men, <S%G444><s%>

Teaching <S%G3811><s%> us that, denying <S%G720><s%> ungodliness <S%G763><s%> and worldly <S%G2886><s%> lusts, <S%G1939><s%> we should live <S%G2198><s%> soberly, <S%G4996><s%> righteously, <S%G1346><s%> and godly, <S%G2153><s%> in this <S%G3588><s%> present <S%G3568><s%> world; <S%G165><s%>

Looking <S%G4327><s%> for that blessed <S%G3107><s%> hope, <S%G1680><s%> and the glorious <S%G1391><s%> appearing <S%G2015><s%> of the great <S%G3173><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> and our Savior <S%G4990><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ; <S%G5547><s%>

Who <S%G3739><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> for us, that he might redeem <S%G3084><s%> us from all <S%G3956><s%> iniquity, <S%G458><s%> and purify <S%G2511><s%> to himself <S%G1438><s%> a peculiar <S%G4041><s%> people, <S%G2992><s%> zealous <S%G2207><s%> of good <S%G2570><s%> works. <S%G2041><s%>

These <S%G5023><s%> things speak, <S%G2980><s%> and exhort, <S%G3870><s%> and rebuke <S%G1651><s%> with all <S%G3956><s%> authority. <S%G2003><s%> Let no <S%G3367><s%> man <S%G3367><s%> despise <S%G4065><s%> you.
